attributes.action: Remove the stamp duty on house purchase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With house prices ever increasing pensioners living in houses that were once modest and now trying to downsize to provide money for improved living standards have to pay the government stamp duty equivalent to 1 years married couples State pension for the privilege of moving to a smaller home if the cost is over £250k.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
